id.game_description1: Di Game ini anda akan diuji berapa hafal semua karakter dari series catch Teenieping
id.game_description2: Kamu akan diberikan sebuah gambar dan petunjuk. Tebaklah Teenieping tersebut dalam batas waktu dan kesempatan yang diberikan!
id.incorrect_message_no_attempts: Kesempatan habis! Jawaban yang benar adalah: "{correctAnswer}".
id.time_up_message: Waktu habis! Jawaban yang benar adalah: "{correctAnswer}".
id.game_complete_message: Selamat! Anda telah menyelesaikan semua tebakan! Skor akhir Anda: Benar {correctCount}, Salah {incorrectCount}.
id.error_loading_game: Gagal memuat game. Silakan coba lagi.

en.game_description1: In this game, you will be tested on how well you remember all the characters from the Teenieping catch series.
en.game_description2: You will be given a picture and clues. Guess the Teenieping within the given time and opportunities!
en.incorrect_message_no_attempts: Attempts exhausted! The correct answer is: "{correctAnswer}".
en.time_up_message: Time's up! The correct answer is: "{correctAnswer}".
en.game_complete_message: Congratulations! You have completed all guesses! Your final score: Correct {correctCount}, Incorrect {incorrectCount}.
en.error_loading_game: Failed to load game. Please try again.
